page.title: 12MY FAMILY IN ABINGDON(1)
page.content: My family ,the Carters, live at 104 Caldecott Rd, Abingdon.My Dad's name is Philip.My Mum's name is Veronica.My brother's name is Darren.My Dad was born on March 4th 1943,he is 42 years old.My Mum wsa born on August 6th 1947, she is 37 years old.My brother was born on October 27th 1971,he is 13 years old.I was born on October 19th 1973,I am 11 years old. My Mum and Dad got married on March 5th 1966,at Sutton Courtenay church,they went to their flat for their honeymoon.We have not always lived in the same house.My Mum and Dad have lived in Park Road,Abingdon,then they moved to Southmoor Way,Abingdon,that was a flat Then they moved to a house in Overmead, Abingdon,before we moved to our present house. My Dad is a self-employed roofer.My Mum is a housewife who likes gardening.(continued page 13).
